languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас осекается.{/n} "Точнее, мог бы рассказать, если бы был жив".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ахиллеас осекается.{/n} "Точнее, мог бы рассказать, если бы был жив".

languages.text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас осекается.{/n} "Точнее, мог бы рассказать, если бы был жив".

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯突然意识到说错了话。{/n}“我是说，如果他还活着的话，他本可以告诉您这些。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯突然意识到说错了话。{/n}“我是说，如果他还活着的话，他本可以告诉您这些。”

languages.text: {n}Achilleas se detiene.{/n} «Bueno, supongo que en caso de que siguiera vivo podría haberle informado».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas se detiene.{/n} «Bueno, supongo que en caso de que siguiera vivo podría haberle informado».

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは自分の発言に驚く。{/n}「つまり、ヴァン・カロックス様がご存命ならば、お話しいただけたということです」」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは自分の発言に驚く。{/n}「つまり、ヴァン・カロックス様がご存命ならば、お話しいただけたということです」」

languages.text: {n}Achilleas unterbricht sich.{/n} "Will heißen, er könnte es, wenn er noch am Leben wäre."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas unterbricht sich.{/n} "Will heißen, er könnte es, wenn er noch am Leben wäre."

languages.text: {n}Achilleas se ressaisit.{/n} « Enfin, il pourrait vous en dire plus s'il était vivant, bien évidemment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas se ressaisit.{/n} « Enfin, il pourrait vous en dire plus s'il était vivant, bien évidemment. »

languages.text: {n}Achilleas kendini düzeltiyor.{/n} "Daha doğrusu, hayatta olsaydı verirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas catches himself.{/n} "That is to say, he could tell you if he were alive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas kendini düzeltiyor.{/n} "Daha doğrusu hayatta olsaydı verebilirdi."
